entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 03:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: NE 30 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
